summary: This is an email chain from April 2021 regarding the preparation of a photo for discovery production in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The correspondence involves US Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel and an FBI Special Agent discussing whether to stamp the photo as confidential and adding it to a drive for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the discovery production; the photo is being prepared for her case.

events.title: FBI Agent sends photo for Maxwell discovery
events.description: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office sends a photo to be included in discovery materials for Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

events.title: Preparation of photo for Maxwell discovery production
events.description: US Attorney's Office personnel and a contractor coordinate to prepare the photo as a new discovery production for Maxwell, discussing whether to stamp it as confidential and adding it to a drive for the MDC.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated April 13-14, 2021, concerning discovery in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
A photo is being prepared as a new discovery production for Maxwell, with discussion about whether to stamp it as confidential.
The photo originated from an FBI Special Agent at the New York Field Office.
The production was intended to be added to a new drive for the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) and emailed to counsel.
The document references file numbers EFTA00103419 and EFTA00103420, which appear to be related to the photo.
